word_mean: 质点连续地充满所占空间的流体或固体。

sentence.Network_en: These various complaints are part of a continuum of ill-health.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些各种各样的疾病、不适都是身体健康状况欠佳的一种表现。

sentence.Network_en: It is at one end of the cost continuum.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位于成本序列的一端。

sentence.Network_en: You cannot separate one part of history from the continuum.

“连续统”（Continuum）即实数集(有理、无理数的统称)。如奇数集、偶数集、质数集、合数集、n方集、空集等。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin, neuter of continuus (see continuous)

entry.def: A continuum is a set of things on a scale, which have a particular characteristic to different degrees.

example.ex: These various complaints are part of a continuum of ill-health...
example.tran: 这些各种各样的疾病、不适都是身体健康状况欠佳的一种表现。

example.ex: It is at one end of the cost continuum.
example.tran: 这位于成本序列的一端。

entry.def: A continuum is a continuous series of closely connected events.

example.ex: The medical professional bodies reply that development from fertilisation onwards is a continuum.
example.tran: 专业医疗机构答复说受精以后的发育是连续的。

means.word_mean: 1. a continuous nonspatial whole or extent or succession in which no part or portion is distinct of distinguishable from adjacent parts
